fieldsOfStudy: Mission Readiness, Incident Command System, National Incident Management System

headline: Intelligence Analyst, Human Smuggling Cell  at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)

defaultPosition.description:
As part of the Human Smuggling Cell (HSC), Field Intelligence and Operations (FIOS) Section, support mission requirements by researching and analyzing intelligence data, and writing Field Encounter reports and assessments for internal publishing. The focus of the HSC FIOS is Northern Triangle illegal migrants, detained at the Tapachula, Iztapalapa, and Tijuana Mexican detention facilities, who present a public safety threat to the United States. 

Active Clearance: Top Secret/SCI
defaultPosition.title: Intelligence Analyst, Human Smuggling Cell

positions.title: Intelligence Analyst, Human Smuggling Cell

positions.companyName: Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA)
positions.description:
Active Clearance: Top Secret/SCI - Planner for FEMA's Response Directorate, Plans & Exercises Division, Future Planning Section, in the Incident Support Branch. In this role, I have led the development of Federal catastrophic disaster response plans for various regions, States, and territories in the US. Active Team Leader for the DHS Resource Allocation efforts using the Cascadia Subduction Zone (CSZ) scenario. Conduct meetings with DHS Components, conduct analyses and courses of action as well as refinement of data into graduated response levels. For the use of the Office of the Secretary of Homeland Security and the Office of the Administrator of FEMA. 

Active Member of the Domestic Emergency Support Team (DEST) 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Domestic_Emergency_Support_Team

Active Member of the National Response Coordination Center (NRCC)  

Active Member of the Enhanced Watch Team supporting the National Watch Center (NWC)

Former Certified Contracting Officer's Representative (COR) 

Former member of the Southern California Drought Team (for official use only): Analysis of current and future drought situation and development of mitigation plans. Findings submitted to and presented by the National Security Council, the National Security Staff, the White House.  

Former Contracting Officer's Representative (COR III) - Provided contract support to Region IX (California and Hawaii) during their catastrophic Hurricane and Earthquake Plan development from 2013-2015. Traveled frequently to both states and assisted in the development of plans, as well as the negotiation of future plans and contract acquisitions. Provided project management expertise to the Regional Planning Branch at FEMA HQ and provided assistance with the Six Step Planning Process, especially pertaining to Plan Development and Implementation.
positions.title: Planner (Response)

positions.description: Clearance Level: Public Trust; Performed quality control of standard information for passport applications using contemporary security measures, adhering to Federal laws and executive orders issued by the agency.  More information provided upon federal request (for official use only)
positions.title: Passport Specialist

positions.description:
Analyzed business processes and database management for capturing police report data
and identified issues to the Ministry. Researched global anti-organized crime initiatives created legal briefs for Ministry review. Developed victim crime reports for publication to the Ontario Gazette and identified new anti-organized crime initiatives and circulated to the Ministry for action or situational awareness.
